meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> who usually hits you with a <radical>stick</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> finds it in his <radical>heart</radical> to give you some <kanji>leisure</kanji> time.
readingMnemonic: You're just about to start your <kanji>leisure</kanji> time when a group of <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう) appears with their own sticks. You look back for the leader, and he's wearing a bathrobe, sunglasses, and is drinking some hot cocoa. Wait... this is leisure time for... HIM?! OH NO!
